headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; NEW LINE OF STAGES. APPOINTMENT OF SURGEON TO ST. VINCENT'S HOSPITAL. THE DEATH OF ROBERT F. COTTINGHAM. BOARD OF ALDERMEN. BOARD OF ASSISTANTS. COURT OF GENERAL SESSIONS. MARINE COURT.--Before Judge MCCARTHY. MAYOR'S OFFICE

docs.lead_paragraph: NEW LINE OF STAGES.--The stages of Avenue A line commenced running on Wednesday. On that day the public were conveyed free of charge. The following is the rote over which they travel: From the corner of Twenty-third-street and Avenue A, through Avenue A to Essex, Division and Chatham-streets to Park-row, Park-row to Broadway, Fulton, Washington and Cortlandt streets to Jersey City Ferries.

headline.main: JERSEY CITY.; COMMON COUNCIL. SALE OF REAL ESTATE.

docs.lead_paragraph: COMMON COUNCIL.--The Board met at the Lyceum on Tuesday evening; Ald F. B. BETTS, President of the Board, in the Chair. The subject of licensing pedlars of fish, fruit and vegetables, came up for discussion, on an application for a license.
docs.snippet: COMMON COUNCIL.--The Board met at the Lyceum on Tuesday evening; Ald F. B. BETTS, President of the Board, in the Chair. The subject of licensing pedlars of fish, fruit and vegetables, came up for discussion, on an application for a license.

docs.lead_paragraph: There can be but little doubt that of all the preventive of disease, or preservatives of health, systematic bathing holds the foremost rank. Any one who will take the trouble to reflect for a moment on the peculiar functions of the skin, and the influence they exert, sympathetically, over the functions of the internal organs of the body, must,I think, come to this conclusion.

headline.main: PHILADELPHIA.; The Weather--The Attorney-General and the Quarantine Affairs-Accidents-Incidents--Markets, &c.

docs.lead_paragraph: We have had another hot and sultry day the thermometer varying from 90[degrees] to 93[degrees], driving a number of our folks down to Cape May. WILLIAM B. REED, our energetic Attorney General, took the initiatory steps this morning to bring our Quarantine officers to their senses.

docs.lead_paragraph: An invitation front the citizens to attend a party to-night, at the American Hotel, was accepted. Washington was fixed upon for the next meeting in May, 1854. Professor DANA, of New-Haven, was elected President ; Professor LOVERING, Permanent Secretary : J. L. SMITH, General Secretary ; Dr. ELWYN, Treasurer ; Drs. HELDERMAN, LEIDY, and LECONTE, Auditing Committee.

headline.main: PUBLIC HEALTH.; The East River Leases to Reynolds, the Offal Contractor--Communication from the City Comptroller, Azariah C. Flagg, Esq., to the Common Council.

docs.lead_paragraph: Our City Comptroller finds the key of the strong-box useful for other purposes than the exclusion of Aldermanic paws from the deposits. Let us be grateful for every enlargement of his faculties. We admired the application of his financial functions to the protection of the Battery against encroachment, because the act had the joint merit of manliness and unexpectedness.
